system.effect: If not within 20m of a Tyranid Creature with the Synapse Creature Trait, the creature will act in an instintual way. This may be through Lurking in the shadows and fleeing direct combat, or devolving into a maddened berzerker state, or something else. Regardless, they cannot be directly to perform complex behaviours by the Hive Mind.
